Header: Pope Francis meets lasi Catholics in eastern Romania
Content: Pope Francis visited a cathedral before addressing an audience of young people and families in the eastern Romanian city of Iasi at the end of his second day in the country. Francis led a congregation in prayer in the city’s Our Lady Queen of Iasi Cathedral and spoke to tens of thousands of young people outside lasi’s Palace of Culture, telling them to remain united and look for fresh bonds to unite people. Pope Francis will travel to Blaj where he will beatify seven communist-era bishops of the Eastern Rite Catholic Church who died as a result of harsh conditions during incarceration.
